Container.Name: CUPS
Container.Description: CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by Apple Inc. for OS X速 and other UNIX速-like operating systems. CUPS uses the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and network printers.[br][br] [b]This container has support for AirPrint and for Google CloudPrint.[/b][br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b][span style=\'color: #0088CC;\']Paths:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config :[/b] set this path to where you wish CUPS to store it\'s configuration.[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #0088CC;\']Variables:[/span][/b][br] [b]CUPS_USER_ADMIN :[/b] choose the username used to admin CUPS (default [b]admin[/b]).[br] [b]CUPS_USER_PASSWORD :[/b] choose the password used to admin CUPS (default [b]pass[/b]).[br] [b]CLOUD_PRINT_EMAIL :[/b] set the e-mail you use to login on your Google account (empty e-mail will disable CloudPrint).[br] [b]CLOUD_PRINT_PASS :[/b] set the password you use to login on your Google account. If you use two-step authentication, you must use an app password which can be found [a href=\'https://security.google.com/settings/security/apppasswords\' target='_blank'] here[/a].
Container.Overview: CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by Apple Inc. for OS X速 and other UNIX速-like operating systems. CUPS uses the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and network printers.
